data.content:
Danh từ
cô gái đẹp chưa mấy ai để ý
người bị lãng quên; vật bị lãng quên
this department has been the Cinderella of the company for far too long
gian hàng này bị công ty lãng quên đã quá lâu rồi

noun
plural -las
[count] Cinderella is the name of a girl in a fairy tale who is treated badly by her stepmother and stepsisters but who marries a prince in the end.
someone or something that is ignored but that deserves attention or credit
a company that is the Cinderella of the computer industry
chiefly US :someone or something (such as a sports team) that is not expected to do well but that succeeds or wins in a very exciting way
The team is the Cinderella of the tournament. - often used before another noun
a Cinderella team that surprisingly took the championship
Their win was a classic Cinderella story.
